Echo-Loop Game

Train your bias detection through headline pairs.

How it works

  1. 1You'll see two headlines about the same topic
  2. 2Pick which one "pulls you in more"
  3. 3We'll measure your reaction time and emotional triggers

What we're measuring

Emotional bias percentage, reaction time patterns, and self-awareness. This isn't about being "right"â€”it's about noticing your own patterns.
